entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove EnableUnsafeBinaryFormatterSerialization setting in default runtimeconfig.json #43228
  • Runtime error with Blazor Server projects that include an MSBuild target depending on the CoreBuild target. (.NET SDK Preview 7) #43225
  • Debugging a .NET 8 App on Android 5 and 6 launches Intent Resolver Activity #43223
  • Cannot update workloads #43210
  • NET9-pr7 x86 AOT Some Registry Missing #43208
  • `dotnet run --tl:on` interpreted as application argument #43207
  • Pdb file for assembly /usr/local/share/dotnet/x64/shared/Microsoft.NETCore.App/8.0.8/System.Private.CoreLib.dll was not found or failed to read #43206

PullRequests

Created

  • Use PortableRid config value for self-contained publish test #43234
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add storage location to key vault config #43232
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix feature band when assigning a workload to a workload install type #43231
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update dotnet test protocol messages #43226
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Summary of how we do localization in this repo #43202
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Allow roslyn binary into VMR #43205
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Static Web Assets] Expose endpoint manifest type #43167
    untriaged
  • Warn when NuGetPackageRoot is empty but needed for the toolset compiler #43119
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Merge the net10 dotnet/runtime and dotnet/aspnetcore codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Dev Device ID #43148
    untriaged, Document for new feature, Area-Telemetry, 9.0.1xx
  • Clean up some code #42775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Warn when enabling Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #43039
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Update the error for targeting net9 in 17.11 #43143
    untriaged
  • [Blazor] Fix hot reload for components with collocated JS files #43199
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [VMR] Add "buildPass" parameter to vmr-build jobs templates #43193
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix issues with Blazor WASM delta applier #43152
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add PGO for F# compiler #42514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix the minimum supported version for targeting net9 #43142
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Add RazorLangVersion 9 #40348
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add an implicit reference to the Generate SBOM task #43151
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #43198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add analyzer redirecting VSIX #42861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Shutdown toolset compilers #43135
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable BundleNativeAotCompiler for riscv64 architecture #42158
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Static web assets] Reduce allocations on DefineStaticWebAssetEndpoints #43099
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-AspNetCore, 9.0.1xx
  • Clean up error experience when downloading non-tools #43045
    untriaged, Area-Tools, 9.0.1xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #43196
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
